desc: Are you searching for deeper Purpose? We would be honored to guide you as you find your Way. Your journey will be accelerated with sound baths. Higher frequencies of guided meditations combined with the sounds of singing bowls stimulate your body to “reset” to reveal your deeper Truth and to gain insight and direction.

layout.text: Transform your reality with the power of frequency, sound and vibration!
HOST A PRIVATE GROUP SOUND BATH - COLORADO
